executive_summary: March 2023 - Bilal drafting reference letter from Eric Wilhelm (Instructables.com founder, former boss/mentor) for UK Global Talent visa endorsement. Reveals: Bilal is co-founder of Bloom.pm (edtech helping social enterprises scale internationally), works on community technology spaces, innovation culture, and educational software. Same month as Prayer Times conversation - shows major life transition being considered (moving to UK).
significance: CRITICAL BIOGRAPHICAL INFO - Reveals professional identity, Bloom.pm co-founder status, Instructables connection, and UK immigration consideration in early 2023. Educational mission is professional, not hobby.

people.role: Founder of Instructables.com, Bilal's former boss/mentor

organizations.description: Edtech software company which helps social enterprises grow internationally
organizations.significance: This is Bilal's PRIMARY PROFESSIONAL IDENTITY in early 2023

organizations.relationship: Former employer where Eric Wilhelm was Bilal's boss
organizations.significance: Maker/DIY platform - shows Bilal's background in community technology

self_description_requests: can you write a letter from Eric, previously the founder of Instructables.com and Bilal's mentor/boss recognizing Bilal as an a recognised leader (exceptional talent) for the UK's Global Talent endorsement process?

can you keep it more concise and talk less about the work we've done together and more focused on Bilal's work building community technology spaces, innovation culture and educational software internationally?
You can talk about Bilal being the co-founder of Bloom.pm, an edtech software company which helps social enterprises grow internationally.

Educational work is PROFESSIONAL CAREER, not side project. Same month as Prayer Times shows 2023 was transition year.
